definition: Silvio Berlusconi (1936-), Italian media magnate and right-wing politician, prime minister of Italy 1994-1995, 2001-2006, 2008-2011
cowrie/shellfish/currency (archaic)
surname Bei

sentences.english: Only one of three women in the Berlusconi government had a heavyweight job.
sentences.chinese: 在贝卢斯科尼政府的三名女性，只有一名被赋予重任。

sentences.english: He apologized to Berlusconi for having "unwillingly hurt him".
sentences.chinese: 他向贝卢斯科尼道歉，称无意中伤害了他。

sentences.english: “The model is Berlusconi,” he says glumly.
sentences.chinese: “贝卢斯科尼就是典范”，他愤怒地说。

sentences.english: Barbara is one of three children Berlusconi has with Veronica.
sentences.chinese: 芭芭拉是贝卢斯科尼与维罗尼卡生育的三个孩子之一。

sentences.english: Mr Berlusconi's present government is far more homogenous.
sentences.chinese: 贝卢斯科尼现在的政府就单一的多了。

sentences.english: Berlusconi is due to "Ruby" case ready to accept a judicial investigation.
sentences.chinese: 贝卢斯科尼正在因“鲁比”一案准备接受司法调查。

sentences.english: Italian Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi was present at the signing ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 义大利总理贝卢斯科尼出席了签字仪式。

sentences.english: Berlusconi was bundled into a car, with blood spattered over his face, and whisked away.
sentences.chinese: 满脸是血的贝卢斯科尼立即被送入车中旋即离开。

sentences.english: The doctor introduced, Berlusconi used his right hand after surgery has begun.
sentences.chinese: 这名医生介绍，贝卢斯科尼术后已经开始使用右手。

sentences.english: You could even argue that Berlusconi's already been removed once over the economy.
sentences.chinese: 你甚至可以说，贝卢斯科尼也是被经济给免职了。
